long_description: The REI Travel Document Organizer helps organize and secure all of your travel documents in a compact, easily accessible case. Multiple interior pockets provide separate places for tickets, currency, passports, cards and more. Organizer opens flat for easy access to contents; fully zippered closure helps keep items securely inside. Includes an exterior zip pocket. The REI Travel Document Organizer has a low-profile handle that won't hang up when you slide the case inside larger carry-on bags.
short_description: The REI Travel Document Organizer helps organize and secure all of your travel documents in a compact, easily accessible case.
